plugin.name: Autoload
plugin.description: Let Mavo load all the needed plugins for you automatically!
plugin.author: dmitrysharabin

plugin.name: TinyMCE
plugin.description: Edit rich text, straight from Mavo!
plugin.author: leaverou

plugin.name: Markdown
plugin.description: Edit properties in Markdown and display them with HTML. Uses the popular [Showdown](http://showdownjs.github.io/demo/) library.
plugin.author: leaverou

plugin.name: Dropbox
plugin.description: Use [Dropbox](https://dropbox.com) for remote storage. It takes care of authentication, and only provides editing and saving controls to users that have appropriate permissions.
plugin.author: leaverou

plugin.name: Github Gist
plugin.description: Use Github gists for storage. Supports updating, forking, and even creating new gists!
plugin.author: leaverou

plugin.name: Github PR
plugin.description: Send pull requests when using Github as a backend!
plugin.author: dmitrysharabin

plugin.name: Twitter Embed
plugin.description: Turn Twitter URLs in your Markdown properties into embedded tweets! Requires the [Markdown](https://plugins.mavo.io/plugin/markdown) plugin.
plugin.author: leaverou

plugin.name: Share
plugin.description: Share data via system clipboard, email, contacts or messaging applications, and Bluetooth or Wi-Fi channels.
plugin.author: dmitrysharabin

plugin.name: Import HTML
plugin.description: Use CSS properties to set Mavo attributes, which lets you add them to **a lot** of elements at once and import data from existing HTML!
plugin.author: leaverou

plugin.name: Yaml
plugin.description: Store and/or read data in Yaml instead of JSON. Uses the popular [JS-Yaml](http://nodeca.github.io/js-yaml/) library.
plugin.author: leaverou

plugin.name: Clear/Reset toolbar button
plugin.description: Clears any data in storage and returns the app to its initial state, before any data was stored.
plugin.author: leaverou

plugin.name: Firebase Firestore
plugin.description:
Store and sync app data in milliseconds. Store and serve files at Google scale. Authenticate users simply and securely.
All the [Google Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/) powers are at your fingertips.
plugin.author: dmitrysharabin

plugin.name: Google Sheets
plugin.description: Use [Google Sheets](https://www.google.com/sheets/about/) as a data source and storage. Collaborate with others on the same spreadsheet simultaneously, use formulas and functions. And then use the obtained data in your app.
plugin.author: dmitrysharabin

plugin.name: List Separator
plugin.description: Store and read lists of simple properties as a single text value. Useful in conjunction with the Google Sheets plugin to store multiple values in a single cell.
plugin.author: leaverou

plugin.name: Google Calendar
plugin.description: Integrate Google calendars into your Mavo apps!
plugin.author: dmitrysharabin

plugin.name: Google Drive
plugin.description: Store and read data from Google Drive.
plugin.author: efeichen

plugin.name: PHP Backend
plugin.description: Use your own PHP-enabled server with Mavo.
plugin.author: falafel65

plugin.name: French Locale
plugin.description: Translates all Mavo UI to French.
plugin.author: falafel65

plugin.name: Greek Locale
plugin.description: Translates all Mavo UI to Greek.
plugin.author: leaverou

plugin.name: Mavo sort
plugin.description: Sort collections in your Mavos.
plugin.author: Dsan10s

plugin.name: Firebase
plugin.description: Google Firebase backend that supports syncing data in real-time.
plugin.author: valterkraemer

plugin.name: CouchDB
plugin.description: CouchDB backend that supports syncing data in real-time.
plugin.author: valterkraemer

plugin.name: Mavo Offline
plugin.description: Caches data and allows saving when offline, then automatically saves when online again.
plugin.author: valterkraemer

plugin.name: Hebrew Locale
plugin.description: Translates all Mavo UI to Hebrew.
plugin.author: seffyfisher

plugin.name: Russian Locale
plugin.description: Translates all Mavo UI to Russian.
plugin.author: dmitrysharabin

plugin.name: Spanish Locale
plugin.description: Translates all Mavo UI to Spanish.
plugin.author: speciale

plugin.name: Microdata migration
plugin.description: Use Microdata itemprop/itemscope/itemtype attributes to define Mavo stuff. Useful if you were relying on this functionality that got removed in v0.2.0.
plugin.author: leaverou

plugin.name: Cropper
plugin.description: Edit (crop, scale, rotate, flip) an image in place and upload it to the chosen backend. Uses the [Cropper.js](https://fengyuanchen.github.io/cropperjs/) library.
plugin.author: dmitrysharabin

plugin.name: Chart
plugin.description: Visualize data in your Mavo apps with animated, customizable, and responsive charts. Uses [Chart.js](https://www.chartjs.org/).
plugin.author: dmitrysharabin

plugin.name: Chinese Locale
plugin.author: roadlabs
plugin.description: Translates all Mavo UI to Chinese.

plugin.name: MathJax
plugin.description: Beautiful math in Mavo apps in all browsers. Uses the [MathJax](https://www.mathjax.org/) library.
plugin.author: dmitrysharabin

plugin.name: Brasil Locale
plugin.description: Translates all Mavo UI to Português-Brasil.
plugin.author: rubensdemelo
